article_title: Walgreens Steps Up Retail Clinic Expansion As Demand For Convenient Care Grows

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Most of the top pharmacy chains in the U.S. are, therefore, increasing focus on selling beauty products and also remodeling stores in the process. Drug retailers have found another source of growth in retail health clinics, which have been proliferating across the U.S. for the last few years. Walgreens currently has 400 healthcare clinics spread throughout the country. CVS Health, on the other hand, is far ahead in the race with about 1,000 clinics and plans to further expand to 1,500 clinics by 2017.
